title: Poughkeepsie Begins (The Poughkeepsie Brotherhood Series Book 4)
features: It ends with the beginning. This legendary, indie, cult-favorite series ends its tale with the story of the Poughkeepsie brotherhood before the tattoo. Before the train station, before the church, before a criminal empire, there was a foster home and three teen boys who weren't related by blood. But damn if they aren't closer than most blood families by their choice. Â  Still in high school, Beckett is already laying the groundwork for a grander life ahead, one where his brothers want for nothing and get some respect for once. But even as he plans, Beckett must decide if heâ€™s ready to make that choiceâ€”diving into a life that trades his chance at a future, his chance at something as simple as first love with a girl named Candy Cox, for the chance for his brothers to find happiness. Â  Blake, Beckett, and Coleâ€™s devotion to each other is forged by fists and the driving need to belong somewhere, to do more than just survive this life. Readers of the series know they each get there in the end, but before we count smiles, we must first shed tears. These early days of the Poughkeepsie brotherhood will play on your heartstrings before serrating them with a knife; theyâ€™ll lift your soul with music, only to leave you with nothing but a desperate prayer for hope. Â  And when you reach the end of the beginning, youâ€™ll be ready to start the series all over again.
